name: ts-echowo
description: Port of win-echowo to node / typescript

scripts.buildRelease: npm run cleanRelease && npm run compileRelease && npm run uglifyRelease && npm run packageRelease
scripts.packageRelease: npm run packageMac && npm run packageLinux && npm run packageWindows
scripts.packageWindows: npx nexe build/Release/index.js -o build/Release/node-echowo --build --python python3 -t windows-x64
scripts.packageMac: npx nexe build/Release/index.js -o build/Release/node-echowo-mac --build --python python3 -t mac-arm64
scripts.packageLinux: npx nexe build/Release/index.js -o build/Release/node-echowo-linux --build --python python3 -t linux-x64
scripts.uglifyRelease: npm run uglifyIndex && npm run uglifyHelp && npm run uglifyInterjection && npm run uglifyOptions && npm run uglifyRandomGenerator && npm run uglifyReplacements

author: Markus Aigner
